article_title: U.K.’s George Osborne Warns of Fresh Spending Cuts
article_text:
LONDON—U.K. Treasury chief George Osborne said Sunday that he would need to make fresh cuts to public spending to meet his goal of balancing Britain’s books by 2020.

Speaking to the British Broadcasting Corp. ahead of his annual budget statement Wednesday, Mr. Osborne said that the outlook for the global economy had deteriorated since he set out...
